title: Performance Beyond Training Data
text: Ability to make correct predictions on new, previously unseen data

title: Aim of ML models
text: The goal is to learn the underlying trend or pattern so it can be applied to data it hasn't seen before. Which option describes this best?

title: Avoiding Overfitting and Underfitting
text: A model shouldn't just memorize (overfit) nor should it ignore the data (underfit)
